subject: Basketball (College)
Gambling
Casinos
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: In December, Derek Stevens placed a $20,000 bet on Michigan State winning the N.C.A.A. title at his friend’s casino, and two more Spartan wins would give him a $1 million payoff.
snippet: In December, Derek Stevens placed a $20,000 bet on Michigan State winning the N.C.A.A. title at his friend’s casino, and two more Spartan wins would give him a $1 million payoff.
